attributes.action: Request Research into finding effective treatment for Trimethlymauria ( TMAU )
attributes.additional_details: The odours which are triggered are completely in controllable and vary in intensity and smell. The odours consists of : urine,feces,garbage,rotten fish,chemical. This condition completely ruins a sufferes life and causes more severe implications such as, depression, anxiety, and ptsd. As to date there is no effective treatment or cure which leaves a suffer being mis-diagnosed and left with no where to turn to. We are asking the Goverment to please provide research into Tmau to find a Treatment.
attributes.background: Trimethlymauria is a condition which causes debilitating effects on a suffers life. Due to a defect in the liver or a issue with the gut microbiome, a person suffering from TMAU can not digest food high in choline without causing a severe odour reaction which comes out in there breath and sweat.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is very similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231927
